classitems.description: Simple utility for emitting consistent, standardized deprecation notices for properties, methods, or other arbitrary parts of the radical component API that are slated to be removed in the next major release.
classitems.name: deprecated

params.name: newItem
params.description: The name of the new preferred item

params.name: nextVersion
params.description: = '2.0' The next major release of the app in which the oldItem will be removed.

method.description: Simple utility for emitting consistent, standardized deprecation notices for properties, methods, or other arbitrary parts of the radical component API that are slated to be removed in the next major release.
method.name: deprecated

params.name: newItem
params.description: The name of the new preferred item

params.name: nextVersion
params.description: = '2.0' The next major release of the app in which the oldItem will be removed.
